translations: 宠儿；宠臣；部下；奴才；受人崇拜者
[古语、罕用语]精致的；优雅的；娇美的；漂亮的

sentences.sentence: Don't fall into the trap of becoming a mindless minion.
sentences.translation: 不要掉进陷阱，成了没脑子的奴才。

sentences.sentence: No, my minion, you are my secret weapon. I shall reveal you only when the time is right.
sentences.translation: 不，我的仆人，你是我的秘密武器。我只会在时机适宜时展现你。
